Available are some doubles that are in need of a new home.  Prices include shipping and are net.  Paypal, checks and money orders are ok but if paying by Paypal, it's friends and family but a 3% add for goods is fine.

SOLD

Feel free to reach out via PM or [url]tbrambo@yahoo.com[/url] if you'd like a better scan or scans or any questions you may have.

Thanks!
